pkgmetadata.longdescription: # banalCommons of Python micro-functions. This basically an out-sourced, sharedutils module with a focus on functions that buffer type uncertainties inPython (e.g. "is this a list?").Rules:* Functions are properly typed, library passes `mypy`.* Cannot depend on anything but six and the standard library## Functions* ``is_listish``: check if something is list-ish* ``is_mapping``: check if an object is dict-ish* ``ensure_list``: make sure an argument is a list, or make it into a single-element list* ``clean_dict``: remove null values from a dict, recursively* ``decode_path``: decode a path name to be unicode* ``hash_data``: generate a SHA1 from a dict of reasonable objects
